subject: RE: [junit] Is Junit-based testing REALLY possible for commercial software development ?
msgSnippet: ... Otherwise the very first thing every developer should learn is touch typing... ;) Cheers, Ilja PS: I find that touch typing actually helps me in software
messageBody:
> Programming is NOT about the typing.

Otherwise the very first thing every developer should learn is touch
typing... ;)

Cheers, Ilja

PS: I find that touch typing actually helps me in software development - not
because I type faster, but because typing occupies fewer brain cells...
